blackjack: insert description of blackjack game description/objective

terminology.name: hit
terminology.description: prompts the dealer to add a new card to the player's hand

terminology.name: stand
terminology.description: ends the player's turn with no new cards added

terminology.name: natural
terminology.description: a hand that consists of an Ace and either a 10 or Royal card

terminology.name: insurance
terminology.description: in the case the dealer's face up card is an Ace or a ten-card, the player can make an insuranceup to half of the initial bet that the dealer has a natural. If the dealer does have a natural, then the player is paid double their insurance.

terminology.name: double down
terminology.description: doubles player's original bet when the player's hand has exactly two cards that totals to value of 9, 10, or 11

terminology.name: split
terminology.description: divides a player's hand into two separate hands such taht each hand has one card when the player has a pair of cards with the same denomination

terminology.name: ace to eleven
terminology.description: if an ace is present in hand, change the value of the Ace card to have a card value of 11
